titles.title: For the relief of Peggi M. Houston.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 2/2/1995--Introduced. Authorizes a named individual to bring a claim against the United States for the wrongful death of her husband in connection with allegedly negligent medical diagnosis and treatment by U.S. Army personnel.
